sentence.Network_en: They can be misidentified easily in the subsurface as fossil offshore bars.
sentence.Network_cn: 它们在地下深处最易于与石化了的滨外沙洲混淆起来.

sentence.Network_en: Perhaps this is caused by the sudden melting of subsurface permafrost.
sentence.Network_cn: 可能是地下永久冻土突然融化所造成.

sentence.Network_en: Hydrologists are often interested in the solution of subsurface - flow problems.
sentence.Network_cn: 水文工作者很关心地下水流问题的求解.
